bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Rf Protection of Personnel Working in the Vicinity of Wireless Communications Antennas Attached to Electric Power Line Structures
IEEE Draft Guide for Rf Protection of Personnel Working in the Vicinity of Wireless Communications Antennas Attached to Electric Power Line Structures
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1654/D5, Aug 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Guide presents information on establishing an effective safety program to assure compliance with the applicable regulations for radio frequency (RF) protection of electrical workers in the vicinity of wireless communication antennas adjacent or attached to electrical power line structures. The Guide also provides information on power frequency electric and magnetic field immunity of RF personal monitors and RF protective clothing.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
